title: France panorama. [No. 71/28]
brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. News flashes: the Grand Prix - the season’s main racing event on the Longchamp Hippodrome. 2. The atom and Europe - the “Gargamelle” bubble chamber at the CERN in Geneva. 3. The Proust centenary - Exhibition at the Jacquemard-Andre Museum in honour of the great author Marcel Proust. 4. The Strasbourg Festival - the Strasbourg Music Festival, with Yehudi Menuhin.
